This is MOSTLY complete.  Not totally correct.  

Disc 2 is missing track 1 and 10 so is only 13 tracks.  However it includes 2 tracks which are not on the retail CD listing, and also 2 continuous mixes?  So a strange combination but is correct for the most part

@spikey_58

The tracklisting for this torrent is actually all correct as it is the MP3 retail download version. When a dance music CD comes out it is very often 'in the mix' (just like CD2 and CD3 of this release - CD version). When this is the case the MP3 versions for retail download on itunes etc. have to be the track in is entirety. Often they are unable to licence several tracks in full versions therefore you get a release with one or two tracks missing
